title: Mobile-Based Intensive Nutrition Education Program for Pharmacy Majors

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary pharmaceutical knowledge and fundamental biochemistry concepts
context.additional_context: A nutrition education course using problem-based learning (PBL) and case-based scenarios in a smartphone-based learning environment. Aims to strengthen patient counseling competencies as pharmacists

learning_goals: Learners can explain core concepts of nutrient-disease relationships and drug-nutrient interactions with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can develop personalized nutrition counseling plans by analyzing clinical cases.
Learners can improve their ability to evaluate nutrition labeling and functional food information by over 70%.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
